data.text: @mrhhighschool I think it is great that Mr. Sausele is bringing in very knowledgeable speakers from the community about such important topics as Covid. This way the misinformation that is out in the communities can be dispelled with science and facts.
@mrhhighschool I believe Mr. Sausele spells his name this way and Alex Garza is an MD and should be introduced and addressed as Dr. Alex Garza or Alex Garza, MD.
